message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share this product. I'd like to propose a price of $120 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $140.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $125, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. I can offer the product to you for $135.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've done some research and found that the product is available elsewhere at a lower price. However, I still value our discussion and am willing to pay $130 for the product.
I understand you've done your research, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for less than $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $130, so I can offer the product to you for $137.50.

Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I'm unable to meet your current offer. I would like to propose a final price of $135 for the product.
I'm willing to meet you at $135, Bob, but I need to make a bit more profit. I can offer the product to you for $138.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal, but I'm still looking for a more affordable option. I would like to counter with a price of $136 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $138, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $136, so I can offer the product to you for $137.
